alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater, south central Wheatland, western Carbon, southwestern Golden Valley and central Sweet Grass Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Harlowton to near Big Timber to 22 miles north of Cooke City. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Nye, Melville, Dean and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
